OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD ASSAY OFFICE - VENUES FOR HIRE

Desc.entry: Comprehensive and modern hospitality suites situated within a historical Sheffield business. Offers a choice of spaces from a small meeting room to a full-facility gathering of up to 90 guests. Caters for all requirements from small buffets to 5-course dinners. Menus can be discussed at the time of booking. State-of-the-art audio-visual equipment. Each room is individually lit and air-conditioned and has plenty of natural daylight.
